bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'pointerPosition'; - speed / (speed > 0 ? entity.cruiseSpeed.max : maxBackSpeed) * speedItemHeight * (speed > 0 ? fwdItemsNum : bwdItemsNum)

bind.name: watch
bind.value: 'isNotFull'; entity.ownSquadron && ( (planeType == 'bomber' || planeType == 'torpedobomber') ? !hasBomb : planeType == 'fighter' ? ammo < maxAmmo : false )

bind.name: fade
bind.value: count > 0; 0.15; {alpha: 0, top: 10, ubScaleX: 0}; {alpha: 1, top: 0, ubScaleX: 1}; {alpha: 0, top: 10, ubScaleX: 0}; 2

bind.name: fade
bind.value: count > 0; 0.15; {alpha: 0, top: 10, ubScaleX: 0}; {alpha: 1, top: 0, ubScaleX: 1}; {alpha: 0, top: 10, ubScaleX: 0}; 2

bind.name: appear
bind.value: 'addedToStage'; 0.35; 0; {alpha: 0, top: -50, left: -145, scaleX: 2, scaleY: 2, ubScaleY: 0}; {alpha: 1, top: 0, left: 0, scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, ubScaleY: 1}; 2

bind.value: 'evItemDeath_disappear'; 0.15; 0; { alpha: 1, scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1 }; { alpha : 0, scaleX: 0.1, scaleY: 0.1 }

bind.name: transition
bind.value: keyType == 8; 0.3; {scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, ubScaleX: 1, ubScaleY: 1}; {scaleX: 0.75, scaleY: 0.75, ubScaleX: 0.75, ubScaleY: 0.75}; {scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, ubScaleX: 1, ubScaleY: 1}; 2

bind.name: transition
bind.value: keyType == 8; 0.3; {scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, ubScaleX: 1, ubScaleY: 1}; {scaleX: 0.75, scaleY: 0.75, ubScaleX: 0.75, ubScaleY: 0.75}; {scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, ubScaleX: 1, ubScaleY: 1}; 2

bind.name: transition
bind.value: (keyType == 8) ? (!doubleFirstTap && (keyState == 1)) : (keyState == 1); 0.05; {scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, top: 0, left: 0, alpha: 1}; {scaleX: 0.94, scaleY: 0.94, top: 1, left: 1, alpha: 0.9}

bind.name: transition
bind.value: doubleFirstTap && (keyState == 1); 0.05; {scaleX: 1, scaleY: 1, top: 0, left: 0, alpha: 1}; {scaleX: 0.94, scaleY: 0.94, top: 1, left: 1, alpha: 0.9}

bind.value:

{ qc_top: (stageHeight * 0.10) + 'px', qc_left: (stageHeight * 0.5) + 'px' }, { qc_top: (stageHeight * 0.10) + 'px', qc_left: -(stageHeight * 0.5) + 'px' }, { qc_top: -(stageHeight * 0.10) + 'px', qc_left: -(stageHeight * 0.5) + 'px' }, { qc_top: -(stageHeight * 0.10) + 'px', qc_left: (stageHeight * 0.5) + 'px' } ]

bind.name: instance
bind.value: 'PlayerListTextLine'; { _width: '290px', _isAlive: isAlive, _isSelf: isSelf, _ttkStatus: ttkStatus, _tkStatus: tkStatus, _isInSameDivision: isInSameDivision, _text: name, _relation: relation }

bind.value: 'PlayerListTextLine'; { _width: '30px', _isAlive: isAlive, _isSelf: isSelf, _ttkStatus: ttkStatus, _tkStatus: tkStatus, _isInSameDivision: isInSameDivision, _text: frags, _relation: relation }

bind.name: watch

bind.value: isTargetLocked; 0.15; {scaleX:2, scaleY:2, alpha:0}; {scaleX:1, scaleY:1, alpha:1}; {scaleX:0, scaleY:0, alpha:0}; 2; isTargetLocked ? 0.15 : 0.05

bind.name: transition

bind.name: transition
bind.value: newHealth == 0 ? 0.1 : newHealth; 0.15; {scaleX: prevHealth / maxHealth}; {scaleX: newHealth / maxHealth}; null; 1; 0.05
